lead_paragraph: Spain will play Russia in today’s final of the European basketball championship in Madrid.Pau Gasol scored 23 points as Spain beat defending champion Greece, 82-77. In the other semifinal, Andrei Kirilenko scored 29 points and had three blocks as Russia withstood 30 points from Ramunas Siskauskas to hold off Lithuania, 86-74.
